pkgmetadata.longdescription: Catalogues of resolution IV 128 run 2-level fractional factorials up to 33 factors that do have 5-letter words // This package provides catalogues of resolution IV regular fractional factorial designs in 128 runs for up to 33 2-level factors. The catalogues are complete, excluding resolution IV designs without 5-letter words, because these do not add value for a search for clear designs. The previous package version 1.0 with complete catalogues up to 24 runs (24 runs and a namespace added later) can be downloaded from the authors website.
